00008 #include "modelparametereditor.h"
00009 
00010 #include "usagedelegate.h"
00011 #include <models/component.h>
00012 
00013 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00014 #include <QHBoxLayout>
00015 #include <QHeaderView>
00016 #include <QIcon>
00017 
00018 ModelParameterEditor::ModelParameterEditor(QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00019                                                                                    void* dataPointer,
00020                                                                                    QWidget *parent): 
00021 ItemEditor(component, parent), 
00022 /*detailButton_(tr("Edit details"), this),*/
00023 addRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/add.png"), QString(), this),
00024 removeRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/remove.png"), QString(), this),
00025 view_(this), model_(dataPointer, this) {
00026 
00027         connect(&addRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00028                 &model_, SLOT(onAddRow()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00029         connect(&removeRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00030                 this, SLOT(onRemove()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00031         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00032                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00033         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(dataChanged(const QModelIndex&, const QModelIndex&)),
00034                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00035         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00036                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00037         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00038                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00039 
00040         // set view to be sortable
00041         view_.setSortingEnabled(true);
00042         view_.horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00043         view_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::ResizeToContents);
00044         view_.setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00045         view_.setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00046         //view_.setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows);
00047         view_.verticalHeader()->hide();
00048         view_.setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::AllEditTriggers);
00049         view_.setWordWrap(true);
00050 
00051         // set the delegate to edit the usage column
00052         view_.setItemDelegate(new UsageDelegate(2, this));
00053 
00054         // set proxy to do the sorting automatically
00055         proxy_ = new QSortFilterProxyModel(this);
00056 
00057         // set source model for proxy
00058         proxy_->setSourceModel(&model_);
00059         // set proxy to be the source for the view
00060         view_.setModel(proxy_);
00061 
00062         // sort the view
00063         view_.sortByColumn(0, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00064 
00065         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00066         //buttonLayout->addWidget(&detailButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00067         buttonLayout->addWidget(&addRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00068         buttonLayout->addWidget(&removeRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00069         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00070 
00071         // create the layout, add widgets to it
00072         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00073         layout->addWidget(&view_);
00074         layout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00075 
00076         model_.restore();
00077 }
00078 
00079 ModelParameterEditor::~ModelParameterEditor() {
00080 }

00082 void ModelParameterEditor::onRemove() {
00083 
00084         QModelIndex index = proxy_->mapToSource(view_.currentIndex());
00085 
00086         // if index is valid then remove the row
00087         if (index.isValid())
00088                 model_.onRemoveRow(index.row());
00089 }
00090 
00091 bool ModelParameterEditor::isValid() const {
00092         return model_.isValid();
00093 }
00094 
00095 void ModelParameterEditor::makeChanges() {
00096         model_.apply();
00097 }
